verses.verse: Then wrought <S%H6213><s%> Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> and Aholiab, <S%H171><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> in whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H1992><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and understanding <S%H8394><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> how to work <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all manner <S%H3605><s%> of work <S%H4399><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H413><s%> Bezaleel <S%H1212><s%> and Aholiab, <S%H171><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had put <S%H5414><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> even every one <S%H3605><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred him up <S%H5375><s%> to come <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it:

And they received <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the offering, <S%H8641><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had brought <S%H935><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> it withal. And they <S%H1992><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him free offerings <S%H5071><s%> every morning. <S%H1242><s%> <S%H1242><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the wise men, <S%H2450><s%> that wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> came <S%H935><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> from his work <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> made; <S%H6213><s%>

And they spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> much more <S%H7235><s%> than enough <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1767><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the work, <S%H4399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to make. <S%H6213><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave commandment, <S%H6680><s%> and they caused it to be proclaimed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H6963><s%> throughout the camp, <S%H4264><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let neither <S%H408><s%> man <S%H376><s%> nor woman <S%H802><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> for the offering <S%H8641><s%> of the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%> So the people <S%H5971><s%> were restrained <S%H3607><s%> from bringing. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H935><s%>
For the stuff <S%H4399><s%> they had <S%H1961><s%> was sufficient <S%H1767><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> to make <S%H6213><s%> it, and too much. <S%H3498><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> hearted <S%H3820><s%> man among them that wrought <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of fine twined linen, <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> and blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet: <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> with cherubims <S%H3742><s%> of cunning <S%H2803><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he them.

The length <S%H753><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> were all <S%H3605><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> size. <S%H4060><s%>

And he coupled <S%H2266><s%> <S%H853><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> one <S%H259><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> another: <S%H259><s%> and the other five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> he coupled <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H259><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> another. <S%H259><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the edge <S%H8193><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> from the selvage <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7098><s%> in the coupling: <S%H4225><s%> likewise <S%H3651><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7020><s%> side <S%H8193><s%> of another curtain, <S%H3407><s%> in the coupling <S%H4225><s%> of the second. <S%H8145><s%>

Fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he in one <S%H259><s%> curtain, <S%H3407><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in the coupling <S%H4225><s%> of the second: <S%H8145><s%> the loops <S%H3924><s%> held <S%H6901><s%> one <S%H259><s%> curtain to <S%H413><s%> another. <S%H259><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> taches <S%H7165><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and coupled <S%H2266><s%> <S%H853><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> one <S%H259><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> another <S%H259><s%> with the taches: <S%H7165><s%> so it became <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H259><s%> tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair for the tent <S%H168><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle: <S%H4908><s%> eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> them.

The length <S%H753><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain: <S%H3407><s%> the eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> size. <S%H4060><s%>
And he coupled <S%H2266><s%> <S%H853><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves. <S%H905><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the uttermost <S%H7020><s%> edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> in the coupling, <S%H4225><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he upon <S%H5921><s%> the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> which coupleth <S%H2279><s%> the second. <S%H8145><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> taches <S%H7165><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> to couple the tent together, <S%H2266><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H168><s%> that it might be <S%H1961><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of rams' <S%H352><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> and a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> that.
And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> standing up. <S%H5975><s%>

The length <S%H753><s%> of a board <S%H7175><s%> was ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of a <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> one cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half. <S%H2677><s%>

One <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> tenons, <S%H3027><s%> equally distant <S%H7947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> from <S%H413><s%> another: <S%H259><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> did he make <S%H6213><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle; <S%H4908><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward: <S%H8486><s%>

And forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards; <S%H7175><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for his two <S%H8147><s%> tenons, <S%H3027><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for his two <S%H8147><s%> tenons. <S%H3027><s%>

And for the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> which is toward the north <S%H6828><s%> corner, <S%H6285><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards, <S%H7175><s%>

And their forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> board, <S%H7175><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> another <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>
And for the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> boards. <S%H7175><s%>
And two <S%H8147><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he for the corners <S%H4742><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in the two sides. <S%H3411><s%>

And they were <S%H1961><s%> coupled <S%H8382><s%> beneath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4295><s%> and coupled <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8382><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> thereof, to <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ring: <S%H2885><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> to both <S%H8147><s%> of them in both <S%H8147><s%> the corners. <S%H4740><s%>

And there were <S%H1961><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> boards; <S%H7175><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> were sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> every <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets. <S%H134><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood; <S%H6086><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%>

And five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> for the sides <S%H3411><s%> westward. <S%H3220><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the middle <S%H8484><s%> bar <S%H1280><s%> to shoot <S%H1272><s%> through <S%H8432><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the one end <S%H7097><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the other. <S%H7097><s%>

And he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> with gold, <S%H2091><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> their rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> to be places <S%H1004><s%> for the bars, <S%H1280><s%> and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> <S%H853><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> with gold. <S%H2091><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> a veil <S%H6532><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined linen: <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> with cherubims <S%H3742><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> he it of cunning <S%H2803><s%> work. <S%H4639><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> thereunto four <S%H702><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, and overlaid <S%H6823><s%> them with gold: <S%H2091><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> were of gold; <S%H2091><s%> and he cast <S%H3332><s%> for them four <S%H702><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And he made <S%H6213><s%> a hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined linen, <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> of needlework; <S%H4639><s%> <S%H7551><s%>

And the five <S%H2568><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of it with their hooks: <S%H2053><s%> and he overlaid <S%H6823><s%> their chapiters <S%H7218><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> with gold: <S%H2091><s%> but their five <S%H2568><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> were of brass. <S%H5178><s%>
